hadiths.text: Narrated Abu Said Al-Khudri: Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) said, "A time will soon come when the best property of a Muslim will be sheep which he will take on the top of mountains and the places of rainfall (valleys) so as to flee with his religion from afflictions

chapter.ara-name: باب مِنَ الدِّينِ الْفِرَارُ مِنَ الْفِتَنِ
chapter.eng-name: To flee (run away) from Al-Fitn (afflictions and trials), is a part of religion
